STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Take Your Love for the Game to New Heights
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a game-changer for me as a soccer fan. I can stay updated with live scores, stats, and news from all the major leagues.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The app's match analysis and highlight reels are second to none. It's like having a professional analyst in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The live streaming feature is a game-changer. I can now catch all the action from my favorite teams, no matter where I am.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our soccer app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What features does the app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides live scores, match highlights, team news, player stats, and more for all major soccer leagues and tournaments worldwide.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How can I follow my favorite teams?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can add your favorite teams to a personalized feed and get notifications for their latest matches, news, and updates.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is there a way to watch live matches?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, we offer live streaming of selected matches for many leagues. Check our schedule for upcoming live games.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How do I access historical match data?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our app provides detailed stats and highlights for past matches going back several seasons for all major leagues.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The basic app is free, but we offer a premium subscription with additional features like ad-free viewing and audio commentary.

LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: The Soccer App: Your Game, Your Way
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Whether you're a player, coach, or fan, our app puts the world of soccer at your fingertips. Track your favorite teams, analyze stats, and never miss a moment of the action.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay connected with the beautiful game. SoccerMate brings you live scores, news, stats, and more from your favorite clubs and leagues around the world.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay in the loop with real-time scores, highlights, and analysis from all the major soccer leagues around the world.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Dive deep into comprehensive statistics for teams and individual players, tracking their performance throughout the season.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get the latest news, transfer rumors, and injury updates to keep you informed about your favorite clubs and players.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Read expert analysis and predictions for upcoming matches, giving you an edge when it comes to betting or fantasy leagues.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Never miss a moment by setting up alerts for specific teams, players, or events, ensuring you're always in the know.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with fellow soccer enthusiasts, discuss the latest matches, and share your passion for the beautiful game.
CTA_BODY: Our cutting-edge app delivers personalized training plans, match analysis, and expert insights to help you become a better soccer player.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Track stats, analyze plays, and dominate the pitch.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Soccer App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What does this Soccer app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: This app provides live scores, match updates, player stats, and news related to your favorite soccer teams and leagues from around the world.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How can I follow my team's matches?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can select your favorite team and get notifications for upcoming matches, live score updates, and post-match analysis all within the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does the app cover international leagues?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, the app covers major international soccer leagues like the English Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, and many more.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I get player statistics and transfer news?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely, the app provides detailed player stats, profiles, and the latest transfer rumors and news from reliable sources.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay up-to-date with real-time scores, match highlights, and the latest news from your favorite soccer leagues and teams.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Dive into comprehensive statistics for teams and individual players, including goals scored, assists, and performance metrics.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Get expert insights, predictions, and in-depth analysis to help you make informed decisions and enhance your soccer knowledge.
